Header: Pre-School Students Keep Visiting Palaly Airport
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna facilitated one more group visit of pre-school students to see Palaly Airport on Friday (2). A group of 34 students of Trillium Pre-School (Pvt) in Nallur, Jaffna visited the airport along with their teachers and parents. The visit was arranged by the Security Force Headquarters-Jaffna upon the directions and the guidance of the Commander Security Force - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya. They were also offered refreshments by Army personnel.
